en.today: Focus on making internal adjustments, darling Aries, as Saturn connects with the nodes of fate. This energy streamlines your attempts to cultivate more discipline and structure, helping you overhaul habits and routines to make way for maturity. Find the motivation to let go of behaviors that have slowed you down historically, considering how your approach to wellness influences these realms. Meanwhile, the moon breezes through Aquarius, highlighting your natural genius. Independence and freethinking will serve you, and don't be afraid to color outside of the lines. Securing connections may also be beneficial, so consider reaching out to new acquaintances or colleagues you've wanted to build a rapport with.

en.today: Secure your future by making trades, negotiating terms, and stepping into new commitments, dearest Leo, as Saturn connects with the nodes of fate. Your intuition will guide you toward what the heart truly desires, though you should maintain a strong sense of realism. This will be particularly important to remember when engaging in matters of the heart. If you have felt confused, pulled in different directions, or iced out by someone you love, now is a good time to address these hurdles and set your boundaries. With Luna moving through Aquarius, people won't shy away from fights but will be more inclined to love.
